pages.text: Enoploura is an enigmatic echinoderm from the Ordovician period. It had a thin tail and a flattened body with little fins at the point where the body meets the tail. The way it moves in life is still debated.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
